title: The Mountain does it for me
creator_credit: Oak Creek Films, Len Aitken and Bill Snider
brief_description: Describes a ski program devised for youngsters with cerabral palsy. Looks at both the skiing and the special training and educational approach in the Children’s Hospital, Denver, Colorado. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Oak Creek Films, Len Aitken and Bill Snider
